review: Easy install. Like having all choices in one place.
author: Bobu

review: Found it ok to move around in but not at all free movies, HBO etc.  I thought I was going to be able to return all my cable boxes and just use a fire stick for each room.  However, very little is free even the movies on regular stations! Well, I can can it did light my fire just not in a good way..lol Thanks for your time and have a blessed day! :)
author: Amazon Customer

review: I got rid of cable to save some money and now I can just watch Hulu, Netflix, and Amazon prime quick and easy. I downloaded the app on my phone, making searching even easier. It's awesome!
author: julie

review: It turns a regular tv into a smart tv without the extra cost. Very easy to use.
author: Stephanie Wilson

review: Was a gift. Recipient loves it
author: Matt Girard

review: Great product. Easy to learn and use
author: Mike Berry
